segments.text: There is something wrong with my credit card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a charge on here that I never made .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was a charge for a $ 350 purse that I never bought .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I would remember if I made a purchase that large .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry . When was this purse purchased ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was purchased on the 12th of November at 3
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll do an investigation and get to the bottom of this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In the meantime , do I have to pay for this charge ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . We'll take care of everything .
segments.speaker: S2
